tool_description: Find out the technology stack of any website.
name: Website Technology Lookup
title: Website Technology Lookup

api_list.name: List Groups
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://website-technology-lookup.p.rapidapi.com/list-groups.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "website-technology-lookup.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
